name: State board for career and technical education
text: The board of regents of the University of Hawaii is designated as the state board for career and technical education.  The chairperson of the board of regents is designated as the chairperson of the board for career and technical education and the president of the University of Hawaii, its administrative officer. [L 1968, c 71, pt of §4; gen ch 1993; am L 2000, c 58, pt of §2(2)]
